subject_terms_3: Rail transport Pertadbiran Keretapi Tanah Melayu Former Bukit Timah Railway Station Photography Rail transport (Stations)
physical_appearance: The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It has a black frame and its border is white in colour. A passenger train is visible in the photograph. Three workers are can be seen and one of them is the train driver. The other is standing by the door and the last one is located on the tracks. Both of them are holding a token as part of the railway signalling system. Also, the worker standing on the tracks is holding a flag horizontally in his right hand. Some trees are located in the background of the photograph.
sgcool_label_text: "This image features railway employees at work at the Bukit Timah railway station. It is part of the ""Tracking Memories"" collection by the late Mr Kwek Leng Joo. The collection captures different aspects of the Malayan Railway story in Singapore
title_text: Untitled (locomotive at Bukit Timah railway station)
subject_terms_1: railroads (infrastructures) trains (vehicle groupings) passenger cars (railroad cars) historic monuments blue collar workers locomotives
